description: Returns a list of the existing Amplify apps.

nested_items.name: apps
nested_items.description: A list of Amplify apps.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name for the Amplify app.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: repository
nested_items.description: The Git repository for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The platform for the Amplify app. For a static app, set the platform type to WEB. For a dynamic server-side rendered (SSR) app, set the platform type to WEB_COMPUTE. For an app requiring Amplify Hosting's original SSR support only, set the platform type to WEB_DYNAMIC.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when Amplify created the application.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when Amplify updated the application.

nested_items.name: computeRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role for an SSR app. The Compute role allows the Amplify Hosting compute service to securely access specific Amazon Web Services resources based on the role's permissions. For more information about the SSR Compute role, see Adding an SSR Compute role in the Amplify User Guide.

nested_items.name: iamServiceRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM service role for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: environmentVariables
nested_items.description: The environment variables for the Amplify app.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: defaultDomain
nested_items.description: The default domain for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: enableBranchAutoBuild
nested_items.description: Enables the auto-building of branches for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: enableBranchAutoDeletion
nested_items.description: Automatically disconnect a branch in the Amplify console when you delete a branch from your Git repository.

nested_items.name: enableBasicAuth
nested_items.description: Enables basic authorization for the Amplify app's branches.

nested_items.name: basicAuthCredentials
nested_items.description: The basic authorization credentials for branches for the Amplify app. You must base64-encode the authorization credentials and provide them in the format user:password.

nested_items.name: customRules
nested_items.description: Describes the custom redirect and rewrite rules for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: The source pattern for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

nested_items.name: target
nested_items.description: The target pattern for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status code for a URL rewrite or redirect rule.

nested_items.name: condition
nested_items.description: The condition for a URL rewrite or redirect rule, such as a country code.

nested_items.name: productionBranch
nested_items.description: Describes the information about a production branch of the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: lastDeployTime
nested_items.description: The last deploy time of the production branch.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the production branch.

nested_items.name: thumbnailUrl
nested_items.description: The thumbnail URL for the production branch.

nested_items.name: branchName
nested_items.description: The branch name for the production branch.

nested_items.name: buildSpec
nested_items.description: Describes the content of the build specification (build spec) for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: customHeaders
nested_items.description: Describes the custom HTTP headers for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: enableAutoBranchCreation
nested_items.description: Enables automated branch creation for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: autoBranchCreationPatterns
nested_items.description: Describes the automated branch creation glob patterns for the Amplify app.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: autoBranchCreationConfig
nested_items.description: Describes the automated branch creation configuration for the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: stage
nested_items.description: Describes the current stage for the autocreated branch.

nested_items.name: framework
nested_items.description: The framework for the autocreated branch.

nested_items.name: enableAutoBuild
nested_items.description: Enables auto building for the autocreated branch.

nested_items.name: environmentVariables
nested_items.description: The environment variables for the autocreated branch.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: basicAuthCredentials
nested_items.description: The basic authorization credentials for the autocreated branch. You must base64-encode the authorization credentials and provide them in the format user:password.

nested_items.name: enableBasicAuth
nested_items.description: Enables basic authorization for the autocreated branch.

nested_items.name: enablePerformanceMode
nested_items.description: Enables performance mode for the branch.

nested_items.name: buildSpec
nested_items.description: The build specification (build spec) for the autocreated branch.

nested_items.name: enablePullRequestPreview
nested_items.description: Enables pull request previews for the autocreated branch.

nested_items.name: pullRequestEnvironmentName
nested_items.description: The Amplify environment name for the pull request.

nested_items.name: repositoryCloneMethod
nested_items.description: The Amplify service uses this parameter to specify the authentication protocol to use to access the Git repository for an Amplify app. Amplify specifies TOKEN for a GitHub repository, SIGV4 for an Amazon Web Services CodeCommit repository, and SSH for GitLab and Bitbucket repositories.

nested_items.name: cacheConfig
nested_items.description: The cache configuration for the Amplify app. If you don't specify the cache configuration type, Amplify uses the default AMPLIFY_MANAGED setting.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of cache configuration to use for an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: webhookCreateTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when Amplify created the webhook in your Git repository.

nested_items.name: wafConfiguration
nested_items.description: Describes the Firewall configuration for the Amplify app. Firewall support enables you to protect your hosted applications with a direct integration with WAF.

nested_items.name: webAclArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the web ACL associated with an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: wafStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the process to associate or disassociate a web ACL to an Amplify app.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the current status of the Firewall configuration.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token. Set to null to start listing apps from start. If non-null, the pagination token is returned in a result. Pass its value in here to list more projects.
